creator: Yandex Apps
descriptionHtml:
Important! The beta version is a platform for testing the application. It is intended for experienced users who are prepared to report errors and problems. Send us feedback via the application menu or by email: messenger@support.yandex.ru.

Yandex.Messenger is an instant messenger app for friends and family. Get together with your loved ones, extended family, or people you know from your cooking class to quickly discuss anything in a matter of seconds. You can message anyone, including those of your contacts who do not have Yandex.Messenger installed – your messages will show up in the Yandex app or Yandex Browser on desktop or mobile.
• Personal messages and chat groups – for quick catch-ups and get-togethers.
• Voice and video calls to mobile devices and computers – for the things that can only be said face-to-face.
• Voice messages that convert to text automatically - for when it's just easier to say it.
• News and information channels – to stay in the loop and share what’s important or interesting with others.
• Quick reactions and stickers – sometimes a sticker is worth a thousand words.
• Available in the Yandex app, Yandex Browser and at yandex.ru.
descriptionShort: Stay in touch with those who matter on any device with Yandex.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
• You requested, we did it! You can now delete your chat history.
Open a chat and tap ••• → Clear chat history.
The chat disappears from your chat list, but it remains with your chat partner.
It's easy to resume the chat: just find the contact through search and write to them.
• Added the ability to forward and reply to voice messages.

• While some people really drag out their responses, you can now just drag a message to respond! The familiar swipe-to-reply gesture is now available in Yandex.Messenger.

• And, as usual, we also fixed a few bugs.

Get together with your loved ones, extended family, or people you know from your cooking class to quickly discuss anything in a matter of seconds. You can message anyone, including those of your contacts who do not have Yandex.Messenger installed – your messages will show up in the Yandex app or Yandex Browser on desktop or mobile.
• Personal messages and chat groups – for quick catch-ups and get-togethers.
• Voice and video calls to mobile devices and computers – for the things that can only be said face-to-face.
• Voice messages that convert to text automatically - for when it's just easier to say it.
• News and information channels – to stay in the loop and share what’s important or interesting with others.
• Quick reactions and stickers – sometimes a sticker is worth a thousand words.
• Available in the Yandex app, Yandex Browser and at yandex.ru.
descriptionShort: Stay in touch with those who matter on any device with Yandex.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Everything looks the same but works better.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
You asked, we delivered!
How often have you wanted to forward a link but couldn't remember who added it to the chat and when? How often have you scrolled through the entire chat to find it? Problem solved – we have gathered all the links, files, and pictures in one place. Just open the chat settings and click Photos, files, and links.
They are sorted by date. You can forward the file to a friend or open the original message in a couple of clicks. There are more interesting features to come!

title: Yandex.Messenger (beta)

creator: Yandex Apps
descriptionHtml:
Important! The beta version is a platform for testing the application. It is intended for experienced users who are prepared to report errors and problems. Send us feedback via the application menu or by email: messenger@support.yandex.ru.

Yandex.Messenger is an instant messenger app for friends and family. Get together with your loved ones, extended family, or people you know from your cooking class to quickly discuss anything in a matter of seconds. You can message anyone, including those of your contacts who do not have Yandex.Messenger installed – your messages will show up in the Yandex app or Yandex Browser on desktop or mobile.
• Personal messages and chat groups – for quick catch-ups and get-togethers.
• Voice and video calls to mobile devices and computers – for the things that can only be said face-to-face.
• Voice messages that convert to text automatically - for when it's just easier to say it.
• News and information channels – to stay in the loop and share what’s important or interesting with others.
• Quick reactions and stickers – sometimes a sticker is worth a thousand words.
• Available in the Yandex app, Yandex Browser and at yandex.ru.
descriptionShort: Stay in touch with those who matter on any device with Yandex.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Resolved a few minor issues that may have interfered with chats.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Group chats now have polls.
You decide whether the user can choose one or multiple response options. You can make your poll anonymous or public. In a public poll, each participant can see who voted and download a file with the results.
To create a poll, tap the paperclip icon to the left of the message field.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Keep business and personal messages separate

If your company uses Yandex 360, you'll have a separate space for work chats. You'll be able to search for colleagues by name or job title.

Chats with friends and Yandex services will stay in your personal space. You can switch between organizations in the settings: the dot on the settings icon will tell you that you have new messages there.

title: Yandex.Messenger (beta)

creator: Intertech Services AG
descriptionHtml:
Important! The beta version is a platform for testing the application. It is intended for experienced users who are prepared to report errors and problems. Send us feedback via the application menu or by email: messenger@support.yandex.ru.

Yandex Messenger is a secure corporate messenger with a familiar interface. We've combined important messenger functions and added the features necessary for working in any business, such as inviting teams or departments to a group chat.

It's easier to work on projects when all your work contacts are in one place, and chats with family and friends don't distract you from your tasks.
• There's no more confusion between business and personal messages. No
one else can read your chats: all Yandex Messenger data stays inside the
company, allowing you to work more efficiently with NDA material.
• Quickly search for colleagues by name: company employees will
automatically appear in Yandex Messenger from the company's contact book.
• You can create groups and individual channels, such as for company news,
and then immediately add the necessary department.
• Messages can be marked "important", so you can quickly find them in a separate list.
• Send emojis, stickers, and reactions to messages that won't interfere
with the dialogue.
• Yandex Messenger saves chats from Telemost, so you can check notes
made during video conferences.
• Anonymous and public surveys are available with the option to export the
results as a file.
• Audio messages are automatically transcribed as text.

Yandex Messenger is available with whichever Yandex 360 business plan best suits your company.
descriptionShort: Stay in touch with those who matter on any device with Yandex.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Small bugs fixed, stability increased.

Important! The beta version is a platform for testing the application. It is intended for experienced users who are prepared to report errors and problems. Send us feedback via the application menu or by email: messenger@support.yandex.ru.

Yandex Messenger is a secure corporate messenger with a familiar interface. We've combined important messenger functions and added the features necessary for working in any business, such as inviting teams or departments to a group chat.

It's easier to work on projects when all your work contacts are in one place, and chats with family and friends don't distract you from your tasks.
• There's no more confusion between business and personal messages. No
one else can read your chats: all Yandex Messenger data stays inside the
company, allowing you to work more efficiently with NDA material.
• Quickly search for colleagues by name: company employees will
automatically appear in Yandex Messenger from the company's contact book.
• You can create groups and individual channels, such as for company news,
and then immediately add the necessary department.
• Messages can be marked "important", so you can quickly find them in a separate list.
• Send emojis, stickers, and reactions to messages that won't interfere
with the dialogue.
• Yandex Messenger saves chats from Telemost, so you can check notes
made during video conferences.
• Anonymous and public surveys are available with the option to export the
results as a file.
• Audio messages are automatically transcribed as text.

Yandex Messenger is available with whichever Yandex 360 business plan best suits your company.
descriptionShort: Stay in touch with those who matter on any device with Yandex.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Small bugs fixed, stability increased.

Important! The beta version is a platform for testing the application. It is intended for experienced users who are prepared to report errors and problems. Send us feedback via the application menu or by email: messenger@support.yandex.ru.

Yandex Messenger is a secure corporate messenger with a familiar interface. We've combined important messenger functions and added the features necessary for working in any business, such as inviting teams or departments to a group chat.

It's easier to work on projects when all your work contacts are in one place, and chats with family and friends don't distract you from your tasks.
• There's no more confusion between business and personal messages. No
one else can read your chats: all Yandex Messenger data stays inside the
company, allowing you to work more efficiently with NDA material.
• Quickly search for colleagues by name: company employees will
automatically appear in Yandex Messenger from the company's contact book.
• You can create groups and individual channels, such as for company news,
and then immediately add the necessary department.
• Messages can be marked "important", so you can quickly find them in a separate list.
• Send emojis, stickers, and reactions to messages that won't interfere
with the dialogue.
• Yandex Messenger saves chats from Telemost, so you can check notes
made during video conferences.
• Anonymous and public surveys are available with the option to export the
results as a file.
• Audio messages are automatically transcribed as text.

Yandex Messenger is available with whichever Yandex 360 business plan best suits your company.
descriptionShort: Stay in touch with those who matter on any device with Yandex.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Большое обновление тредов:

• Подписка на треды
Подписка произойдёт автоматически, если вы напишете что-то в треде, если вас упомянут, или если кто-то ответит на ваше сообщение, нажав «Обсудить». Чтобы не пропустить важный комментарий, можно подписаться на тред вручную: откройте тред и нажмите значок подписки справа.

• Список тредов
Экран, где можно найти все треды, на которые вы подписаны. Если в треде появится новое сообщение, счётчик непрочитанных поможет отследить изменения.
